fields.Title: Interfacing: "The woman stands motionless. Just a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The woman stands motionless. Just a heap of clothes and flashers now -- maybe if you search her?

fields.Title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "Fire off a shot over her head and u..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Fire off a shot over her head and use the moment of confusion to close the distance. Left hand grabs the barrel, right one breaks the wrist...

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Huh?" The lieutenant studies the s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Huh?" The lieutenant studies the swaying firearm. "My god, I think you're right."

fields.Title: The Pigs: ""CONFINED QUARTERS, ASSAILANT COMIN..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "CONFINED QUARTERS, ASSAILANT COMING AT ME! SPLIT-SECOND DECISION, FIRE AT WILL!"

fields.Title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "No... no-no-no-no. THEY'RE REALLY N..."
fields.Dialogue Text: No... no-no-no-no. THEY'RE REALLY NOT. The gun wasn't even loaded. No shots fired. You're fine.

fields.Title: You: ""You tried to kill me!!!""
fields.Dialogue Text: "You tried to kill me!!!"

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: Variable["boardwalk.pigs_said_im_sorry_genlty"] == false  and  Variable["boardwalk.pigs_you_tried_to_kill_me"] == false  and  Variable["boardwalk.pigs_youre_not_alone"] == false  and  Variable["boardwalk.pigs_pulled_the_trigger"] == true

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Looks like a bad case." He gives t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Looks like a bad case." He gives the woman a compassionate look. "But the question is what to do with her right now."

fields.Title: The Pigs: ""What...?" The woman looks at the w..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What...?" The woman looks at the weapon in disbelief, her eyes suddenly reddish with tears. She looks straight down the barrel... and squeezes the trigger.

fields.Title: Half Light: "Like when he had the hanged man in..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Like when he had the hanged man in his sights? You're a dead man.

fields.Title: Jump to: [The Pigs: ""SUICIDE BY COP! SPLIT-SECOND DECIS..."]
The Pigs: ""Wh... what is this?" The old woman..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Wh... what is this?" The old woman looks at the treacherous weapon. "This isn't police issue. Police weapons have bullets. This isn't real!"

fields.Title: Half Light: "OH MY GOD!!!!"
fields.Dialogue Text: OH MY GOD!!!!

fields.Title: You: "(Pick up your gun.)"
fields.Dialogue Text: (Pick up your gun.)

fields.Title: The Pigs: ""Why would they cheat me like this?..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Why would they cheat me like this?! I don't have *ANYONE*!" She slams her heavy boot in the ground. The impact travelling through the planks, sends your gun through the crack, into the black nothingness below.

fields.Title: You: "Nod. "Neurodegenerative disease.""
fields.Dialogue Text: Nod. "Neurodegenerative disease."

fields.Title: Logic: "She's in a stupor. There's no telli..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She's in a stupor. There's no telling when she'll snap out of it. If ever.

fields.Title: Authority: "That... was the most honourable thi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: That... was the most honourable thing anyone has ever done, Harry.

fields.Title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "She's frantic, confused, teetering..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She's frantic, confused, teetering under all that gear... There's an opening, if you just move fast enough.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You're right," the lieutenant agre..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're right," the lieutenant agrees. "Let's call her out on this."

fields.Title: You: "Hold on, why does that make me naus..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Hold on, why does that make me nauseous?

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "*This* limbed and headed machine of..."
fields.Dialogue Text: *This* limbed and headed machine of pain and undignified suffering is grinding to a halt. Tired of walking the desert, it doesn't want to feel or think anymore.

fields.Title: The Pigs: "Her scratched skin is warm to the t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Her scratched skin is warm to the touch, but the person inside doesn't even know you're there.

fields.Title: The Pigs: ""Nobody's ever around," the old wom..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Nobody's ever around," the old woman mumbles, staring blank at the boardwalk, "nobody ever comes to visit me."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I guess I'll just notify my statio..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I guess I'll just notify my station. They'll contact the Sanitarium and handle the logistics."

fields.Title: You: "She will *know*. (Hang the Setting..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She will *know*. (Hang the Setting Sun medal on her chest.)

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "No. A strange feeling fills your gu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: No. A strange feeling fills your gut and suddenly you *know* the gun is empty. Thinking about it makes you nauseous.

fields.Title: You: "No, I know myself. I know I'm gonna..."
fields.Dialogue Text: No, I know myself. I know I'm gonna fail.

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "Kim Kitsuragi is a nice guy. Wish h..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Kim Kitsuragi is a nice guy. Wish he was here right now.

fields.Title: You: ""Wait, I was really hoping I can gi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Wait, I was really hoping I can give her one of those station call slips..."

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: (CheckItem("ledger_damaged")  or  CheckItem("ledger_of_failure_and_hatred")  or  CheckItem("ledger_oblivion"))  and  Variable["tc.station_call"] == true

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "Morrand's from Traffic."
fields.Dialogue Text: Morrand's from Traffic.

fields.Title: The Pigs: "A click. Nothing happens. She looks..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A click. Nothing happens. She looks at the useless weapon. "This isn't police issue. Police weapons have bullets. This isn't real! What is this?"

fields.Title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "Alright, this is how we do it: You..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Alright, this is how we do it: You hurl the tare bag in her face -- already darting right -- and *immediately* close the distance. Left hand grabs the barrel, right one breaks the wrist...

fields.Title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "Alright, here's how we do it: As so..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Alright, here's how we do it: As soon as that gun isn't pointed at you again, you dash right, then immediately close the distance. Left hand grabs the barrel, right one breaks the wrist...

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "No. An ominous feeling fills your g..."
fields.Dialogue Text: No. An ominous feeling fills your gut and suddenly you *know* the gun is empty. Thinking about it makes you nauseous.

fields.Title: Logic: "NO! Remember, 'Get the gun, it's ok..."
fields.Dialogue Text: NO! Remember, 'Get the gun, it's okay. It's safe'? It must have meant the gun is not loaded. She's holding an empty gun.

fields.Title: You: ""Go ahead, pull the trigger. I dare..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Go ahead, pull the trigger. I dare you."

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "'Paint the wall with your brains' d..."
fields.Dialogue Text: 'Paint the wall with your brains' dark.

fields.Title: You: ""No gun is worth this risk..." (Slo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No gun is worth this risk..." (Slowly back away.)

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "I was 80% sure the gun is empty and..."
fields.Dialogue Text: I was 80% sure the gun is empty and *still* the instinct almost took over.

fields.Title: You: ""Should we just arrest her?" (Proce..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Should we just arrest her?" (Proceed.)
fields.Alternate1: Alright, what am I gonna do with you? (Proceed.)

fields.Title: Authority: "That... was the most honourable thi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: That... was the most honourable thing *anyone* has ever done. You are virtue embodied.

fields.Title: You: "(Whisper.) "Kim, I'm almost certain..."
fields.Dialogue Text: (Whisper.) "Kim, I'm almost certain there are no bullets in that gun."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""God..." the lieutenant exhales lou..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "God..." the lieutenant exhales loudly and uses his off-hand to wipe his forehead. "I almost blew her head off..."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Phew..." The lieutenant exhales sh..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Phew..." The lieutenant exhales sharply. "For a moment there..."

fields.Title: The Pigs: "The gun lands on the wooden planks..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The gun lands on the wooden planks and tears run down her scratched cheeks. "Police guns always have bullets... What is this? Why did you sell me this?"

fields.Title: You: ""You're not alone. We're all here.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're not alone. We're all here."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""There's a bit more to this than th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "There's a bit more to this than that," the lieutenant disagrees. "But right now we need to decide what to do with her."

fields.Title: You: ""I don't want to endorse the Hardie..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't want to endorse the Hardie boys' inflated sense of self-worth. They're not cops -- we are."

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "She must have built a new -- sadly..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She must have built a new -- sadly better -- reality from the only material available: radio waves and cop shows.

fields.Title: Interfacing: "She stands motionless. Just a heap..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She stands motionless. Just a heap of clothes and flashers now -- maybe if you search her once more?

fields.Title: Half Light: "A madwoman is pointing a gun at a c..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A madwoman is pointing a gun at a cop and you're thinking about warning shots?! Fuck the protocol! Shoot to kill.

fields.Title: You: ""I'm done with this gun." (Leave it..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm done with this gun." (Leave it behind forever.)

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Poor woman..." The lieutenant hols..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Poor woman..." The lieutenant holsters his pistol.  "We need to figure out what to do with her now."

fields.Title: You: ""I guess we'll never know.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I guess we'll never know."

fields.Title: Empathy: "He's trying not to think about how..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He's trying not to think about how bad it could have been had the gun been loaded.

fields.Title: You: ""Cross me again and I will bury you..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Cross me again and I will bury you, Pigs."

fields.Title: The Pigs: "The catatonic woman doesn't underst..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The catatonic woman doesn't understand -- probably even hear -- your kind words. She just *is*.

fields.Title: Authority: "That... was the most honourable thi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: That... was the most honourable thing anyone has ever done.

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "As in 'Traffic' police?"
fields.Dialogue Text: As in 'Traffic' police?

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "In there she is alone, trapped in a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: In there she is alone, trapped in a world of blue and red lights.

fields.Title: Logic: "Her children and their children, if..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Her children and their children, if there were any, stopped coming when it got really bad.

fields.Title: Physical Instrument: "Yeah, with shit-eyes it must be, bi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Yeah, with shit-eyes it must be, binoclard.

fields.Title: You: ""What do you think is happening to..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What do you think is happening to her?"

fields.Title: Empathy: "She looks devastated."
fields.Dialogue Text: She looks devastated.

fields.Title: You: ""Yes. This is what happens when you..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes. This is what happens when you listen to too many cop shows on the radio."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Could be," agrees the lieutenant...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Could be," agrees the lieutenant. "Her hands were trembling and she did seem uncoordinated... But what are we gonna do with her?"

fields.Title: The Pigs: "The catatonic woman -- especially n..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The catatonic woman -- especially now that she's unarmed -- doesn't seem to be a threat to anyone, but herself.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Then we can ask him once we get ba..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Then we can ask him once we get back to the Whirling. But we have to hurry, cause it's late and they might have already gone home."

fields.Title: The Pigs: "Soon someone might have to. Doesn't..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Soon someone might have to. Doesn't look like there's much life left in her.

fields.Title: Composure: "No. Wait... Earlier the lieutenant..."
fields.Dialogue Text: No. Wait... Earlier the lieutenant noticed something. Something about the gun... Could it be empty without her knowing it?

fields.Title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "She's frantic, confused, teetering..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She's frantic, confused, teetering under all that gear... There's an opening, if you just move fast enough... If not, the lieutenant's got her on his sights.

fields.Title: The Pigs: ""SUICIDE BY COP! SPLIT-SECOND DECIS..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "SUICIDE BY COP! SPLIT-SECOND DECISION. EAT LEAD, SCUMBAG!"

fields.Title: Reaction Speed: "In your peripheral vision the lieut..."
fields.Dialogue Text: In your peripheral vision the lieutenant releases the half-squeezed trigger.

fields.Title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "Oh... I see. Okay, the gun was empt..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Oh... I see. Okay, the gun was empty. All is good. You're fine.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "Weapon still trained on The Pigs, t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Weapon still trained on The Pigs, the lieutenant swiftly reaches down to snatch up the gun.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Okay," he nods. "That settles it...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay," he nods. "That settles it. I'll contact my station after we wrap it up for the day. They can contact the Sanitarium and handle the logistics."

fields.Title: Half Light: "Take her to the farm. Put her down."
fields.Dialogue Text: Take her to the farm. Put her down.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I've had... disturbances similar t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I've had... disturbances similar to this before. Many calls, but... never this bad."

fields.Title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "Here's the plan: You jerk left, das..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Here's the plan: You jerk left, dash right, close the distance and cut her hand off. Ready?

fields.Title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "Here's the plan: Shine the light st..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Here's the plan: Shine the light straight in her eye and immediately dart right-- the light will blind her, allowing you to close the distance. Left hand grabs the barrel, right one breaks the wrist...

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I don't think she actually..." The..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't think she actually..." The lieutenant shakes his head. "You're right of course. This could've been very bad."

fields.Title: The Pigs: "The person who did that is no longe..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The person who did that is no longer there. No one is right now. The empty shell of an old woman is slowly rocking back and forth.

fields.Title: You: ""I think we can just leave her like..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I think we can just leave her like this. She'll be fine."

fields.Title: You: "Quietly leave the old woman alone."
fields.Dialogue Text: Quietly leave the old woman alone.

fields.Title: You: ""No, I'm *really* done with it. You..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No, I'm *really* done with it. You keep it."

fields.Title: The Pigs: "As you turn to leave, the faintest..."
fields.Dialogue Text: As you turn to leave, the faintest of voices comes from the woman. "Please, leave the radio on..." she mutters. It seems like a reflex, a half-remembered sentence.

fields.Title: You: ""Understood.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Understood."

fields.Title: You: "Time to get my gun!"
fields.Dialogue Text: Time to get my gun!

fields.Title: Physical Instrument: "...fingers lock behind her head, kn..."
fields.Dialogue Text: ...fingers lock behind her head, knee to the face, knee to the face, crush the ribcage, side-step and drop her with the hammer kick.

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "That gun is a joke compared to the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: That gun is a joke compared to the actual greatest thing he lost.

fields.Title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "Okay, you need to figure out what t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Okay, you need to figure out what to do with her now.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""She's in a stupor," the lieutenant..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "She's in a stupor," the lieutenant replies, inspecting the catatonic woman standing in the dark. "I've seen this before. God knows for how long... Could be days when they get like this."

fields.Title: The Pigs: "The woman stands in front of you, m..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The woman stands in front of you, motionless, unresponsive. Almost like an inanimate object now. A mountain of police paraphernalia.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We could let Titus know. This is a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We could let Titus know. This is a perfect problem for the local 'peacekeepers' to handle. They might even know her family."

fields.Title: You: ""At ease, patrol officer Pigs, your..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "At ease, patrol officer Pigs, your heart is in the right place." (Bow.)

fields.Title: The Pigs: "Doesn't look like she would know th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Doesn't look like she would know the difference anyway.

fields.Title: You: ""Wait...""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Wait..."

fields.Title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "Alright, this is how we do it: You..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Alright, this is how we do it: You fling the prybar at her-- already darting right -- and *immediately* close the distance. Left hand grabs the barrel, right one breaks the wrist...

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I've been thinking that too. But i..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I've been thinking that too. But it's impossible to tell for certain in these lighting conditions."

fields.Title: Physical Instrument: "Host Almighty, don't count on *that..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Host Almighty, don't count on *that*! You saw the binoclard can't shoot for shit!

fields.Title: The Pigs: "But it feels like *you* are, becaus..."
fields.Dialogue Text: But it feels like *you* are, because the old woman standing there is motionless, emotionless and unresponsive. Almost like an inanimate object.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That would just be a waste of pape..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That would just be a waste of paper. I mean look at her." His eyes travel back to the old woman. "She's not going to respond to a station slip."

fields.Title: Empathy: "Exactly. With only the voice of Gar..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Exactly. With only the voice of Gareth Morrand to accompany her on Channel 8.

fields.Title: Physical Instrument: "It's all nancies up there in Traffi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's all nancies up there in Traffic. I count zero balls.

fields.Title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "Here's the plan: Drop the multitool..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Here's the plan: Drop the multitool and immediately dart right -- the noise will startle her, allowing you to close the distance. Left hand grabs the barrel, right one breaks the wrist...

fields.Title: Interfacing: "Grab the gun! Right now! This might..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Grab the gun! Right now! This might be your *ONLY* chance.

fields.Title: You: ""Titus wants to be the sheriff, I'l..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Titus wants to be the sheriff, I'll tell him where to find you. Maybe he knows your family."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Okay but..." He bites his lip and..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay but..." He bites his lip and mumbles under his breath: "... probably couldn't change your mind anyway... Let's go then."

fields.Title: Half Light: "OH MY GOD, YES!!!!"
fields.Dialogue Text: OH MY GOD, YES!!!!

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "That knowledge comes from a very da..."
fields.Dialogue Text: That knowledge comes from a very dark place.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Probably not," the lieutenant agre..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Probably not," the lieutenant agrees. "But more pressing is the question of what to do with her right now?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Honestly, I don't know. Dementia,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Honestly, I don't know. Dementia, probably," he lowers his voice. "Dementia and Channel 8. And loneliness."

fields.Title: You: ""Yeah, Titus sounds like the man fo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah, Titus sounds like the man for the job."

fields.Title: You: ""Thank you, Kim. I *do* actually wa..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Thank you, Kim. I *do* actually want my gun back."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Of course. Understandably things g..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Of course. Understandably things got a bit hectic before. Don't worry about it." He smiles as he hands you the weapon. "Reunited at last. Let's go now."

fields.Title: You: "Nah, that's not worth it."
fields.Dialogue Text: Nah, that's not worth it.

fields.Title: The Pigs: "As you turn to leave, the faintest..."
fields.Dialogue Text: As you turn to leave, the faintest of voices comes from the old lady. It's but a reflex -- nothing else. "Please leave the radio on... Mr. Morrand is on Channel 8..."

fields.Title: Shivers: "A drop of sweat runs down your nose..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A drop of sweat runs down your nose and in it you see the Martinaise inlet, wrapped in the night. In the abandoned fish market two figures face each other in a spectacular light-show. One of them is forced to stare into the three empty barrels of a gun. Not an uncommon sight in the neighbourhood.

fields.Title: You: ""My god, it's not loaded... The gun..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "My god, it's not loaded... The gun isn't loaded!"

fields.Title: Pain Threshold: "CONDITION BLACK, ALL SYSTEMS CRITIC..."
fields.Dialogue Text: CONDITION BLACK, ALL SYSTEMS CRITICAL!

fields.Title: You: ""I'm very sorry this is how life tu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm very sorry this is how life turned out for you." (Gently touch her shoulder.)

fields.Title: You: ""But why was she like this in the f..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "But why was she like this in the first place?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""But I think we're done here for no..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "But I think we're done here for now. Let's head out, this is done."

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "Lieutenant Kitsuragi would probably..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Lieutenant Kitsuragi would probably know what to do, but right now you're just gonna have to leave her like this.

fields.Title: Half Light: "A madwoman is pointing a gun at two..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A madwoman is pointing a gun at two police officers and you're thinking about warning shots?! Fuck the protocol! Take her out!

fields.Title: You: "How dark?"
fields.Dialogue Text: How dark?

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "I was 95% sure the gun is empty and..."
fields.Dialogue Text: I was 95% sure the gun is empty and *still* that instinctual muscle twitch could have ended in an unnecessary death.

fields.Title: Interfacing: "That gun was the single greatest th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: That gun was the single greatest thing you had. This is an enormous loss.

fields.Title: The Pigs: ""No one ever cares anymore," her vo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No one ever cares anymore," her voice is growing fainter as she rocks back and forth, slowly. "Why would they cheat me like this..."

fields.Title: Logic: "Reflex to what? Being left alone?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Reflex to what? Being left alone?

fields.Title: The Pigs: ""Mr. Morrand... Gareth, thank you...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Mr. Morrand... Gareth, thank you. Thank you!" As the sharp end of the pin grazes the flesh, a blessed smile emerges. Then it expires, and like a shadow moving on the ground, all sentience fades again.

fields.Title: Jump to: [The Pigs: ""CONFINED QUARTERS, ASSAILANT COMIN..."]
Hand/Eye Coordination: "Alright, here's the plan: You fling..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Alright, here's the plan: You fling the chaincutters in her face -- already darting right -- and *immediately* close the distance. Left hand grabs the barrel, right one breaks the wrist...

fields.Title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "Porta-reel is the key. Up the volum..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Porta-reel is the key. Up the volume to the *MAX* and hit 'Play'. The sound will startle her, allowing you to close the distance. Left hand grabs the barrel, right one breaks the wrist...

fields.Title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "The gun, throw it in her face -- sh..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The gun, throw it in her face -- she won't see it coming. As she tries to catch or evade, you close the distance. Left hand grabs the barrel, right one breaks the wrist...

fields.Title: Shivers: "A drop of sweat runs down your nose..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A drop of sweat runs down your nose and in it you see the Martinaise inlet, wrapped in the night. In the abandoned fish market three figures stand in a spectacular light-show. A large, loud woman is pointing an empty firearm at the other two. She doesn't want to listen... or even to be heard.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Situation is under control!" The l..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Situation is under control!" The lieutenant's voice rings over the police siren. "You're not shot, she's not a threat, everybody stay calm!"

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "Great gears are grinding to a halt...."
fields.Dialogue Text: Great gears are grinding to a halt. The machine is powering down. She's all out of jolt.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I don't think there's any need for..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't think there's any need for that. In her current state -- and without the gun -- she isn't really a threat to anyone."

fields.Title: Horrific Necktie: "You weirdo. Get outta here before a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You weirdo. Get outta here before anyone sees you.

fields.Title: Interfacing: "No! Look how she's holding it. Like..."
fields.Dialogue Text: No! Look how she's holding it. Like it's light in the nose. It must be... That means the gun is empty!

fields.Title: You: ""Ma'am, the weapon you're holding i..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Ma'am, the weapon you're holding is mine and I *know* it has no bullets."

fields.Title: You: ""You're probably right." (Nod.) "Lo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're probably right." (Nod.) "Loneliness."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No," the lieutenant sharply interj..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No," the lieutenant sharply interjects. "That is not an option. We'll either unload this to Titus and his guys or I'll ask for help from my station."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Oh, before we go..." The lieutenan..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Oh, before we go..." The lieutenant pulls out your service pistol. "I believe this belongs to you."

fields.Title: Logic: "The locals will take care of her. S..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The locals will take care of her. Someone's bound to know her family. Nothing you can do for her anymore.

fields.Title: Authority: "It's a shame. Recognition from an a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's a shame. Recognition from an actual police officer would probably mean a lot to her. Too bad she'll never know...

fields.Title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "Alright, here's the plan: You hurl..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Alright, here's the plan: You hurl the ledger in her face -- already darting right -- and *immediately* close the distance. Left hand grabs the barrel, right one breaks the wrist...

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "No. That won't be necessary. Look c..."
fields.Dialogue Text: No. That won't be necessary. Look closer. The gun, all three barrels, red and blue light shining through -- it's not loaded.

fields.Title: You: ""Gun-gun, I'm coming!" (Go for it.)"
fields.Dialogue Text: "Gun-gun, I'm coming!" (Go for it.)

fields.Title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "Sure, you're you. But how do we end..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Sure, you're you. But how do we end this? She's not just gonna let you leave.

fields.Title: HUB TO THEN END OF THE WORLD
Encyclopedia: "Mr. Morrand? Mr. Gareth Morrand, th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Mr. Morrand? Mr. Gareth Morrand, the former cop, turned Channel 8 crime show host? That Gareth Morrand from the radio?
